schemaList.schemaString: {"schema": {"companyName": {"type": "string","description": "The name of the company."},"companyAddress": {"type": "string","description": "The address of the company."},"date": {"type": "string","format": "date","description": "The date of the transaction (YYYY-MM-DD)."},"time": {"type": "string","format": "time","description": "The time of the transaction (HH:MM)."},"subtotal": {"type": "number","description": "The subtotal amount before taxes."},"tax": {"type": "number","description": "The tax amount applied to the transaction."},"total": {"type": "number","description": "The total amount including taxes."},"items": {"type": "array","description": "List of items purchased.","items": {"type": "object","properties": {"itemName": {"type": "string","description": "The name of the item that appears in the text."},"quantity": {"type": "number","description": "The quantity of the item."},"itemPrice": {"type": "number","description": "The price of a single item."}},"required": ["itemName", "quantity", "itemPrice"]}},"required": ["companyName", "date", "subtotal", "total", "items"]}
